nodes.text: Lasgo Port was a spaceport on an unidentified planet that was visited by Ania Solo and her companions in 139 ABY. The planet was known to have an arena where yarthuls were tamed. While visiting Lasgo Port, Ania and her companions discovered that the Galactic Federation Triumvirate had placed a bounty on her head for the alleged murder of the Imperial Knight Teemen Alton. Shortly later, Ania was kidnapped by her former lover Ramid, who wanted to claim the bounty on her head.
